title: Environment & Nature
description: Learn vocabulary for discussing environmental issues and the natural world.

words.meaning: the natural world around us
words.example: We need to protect the environment for future generations.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 미래 세대를 위해 환경을 보호해야 해요.

words.meaning: harmful substances that damage the environment
words.example: Air pollution is a serious problem in many cities.
words.exampleTranslation: 대기 오염은 많은 도시에서 심각한 문제예요.

words.meaning: long-term changes in temperature and weather patterns
words.example: Climate change is affecting weather patterns worldwide.
words.exampleTranslation: 기후 변화는 전 세계의 날씨 패턴에 영향을 미치고 있어요.

words.meaning: to process materials so they can be used again
words.example: We should recycle plastic, paper, and glass.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 플라스틱, 종이, 유리를 재활용해야 해요.

words.meaning: able to be replaced naturally
words.example: Solar power is a renewable energy source.

words.meaning: animals and plants living in natural conditions
words.example: The forest is home to diverse wildlife.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 숲에는 다양한 야생 동식물이 살고 있어요.

words.meaning: at risk of extinction
words.example: Pandas are an endangered species.

words.meaning: able to continue without damaging the environment
words.example: We need more sustainable farming methods.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 더 지속 가능한 농업 방법이 필요해요.

words.meaning: protecting natural resources and wildlife
words.example: Conservation efforts have helped save many species.
words.exampleTranslation: 보존 노력이 많은 종을 구하는 데 도움이 되었어요.

words.meaning: cutting down large areas of forest
words.example: Deforestation destroys animal habitats.

words.meaning: the natural home of an animal or plant
words.example: Coral reefs are important marine habitats.

words.meaning: a community of living things and their environment
words.example: Rainforests are complex ecosystems.

words.meaning: the amount of carbon dioxide we produce
words.example: Flying has a large carbon footprint.

words.meaning: unwanted materials; to use carelessly
words.example: We produce too much plastic waste.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 플라스틱 쓰레기를 너무 많이 만들어요.

words.meaning: the gradual increase in Earth's temperature
words.example: Global warming is melting the polar ice caps.
words.exampleTranslation: 지구 온난화로 극지방의 빙하가 녹고 있어요.

words.meaning: gas or other substance released into the air
words.example: Car emissions contribute to air pollution.

words.meaning: to keep safe from harm or change
words.example: We must preserve our natural resources.

words.meaning: a long period without rain
words.example: The drought has destroyed many crops.

words.meaning: when water covers an area that is usually dry
words.example: Heavy rain caused flooding in the city.

words.meaning: a group of similar animals or plants
words.example: Thousands of species live in the Amazon.

words.meaning: no longer existing
words.example: Dinosaurs became extinct millions of years ago.

words.meaning: grown without artificial chemicals
words.example: I prefer to buy organic vegetables.
words.exampleTranslation: 저는 유기농 채소를 사는 것을 선호해요.

words.meaning: designed to be thrown away after one use
words.example: We should use fewer disposable products.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 일회용 제품을 덜 사용해야 해요.

words.meaning: a supply of something useful
words.example: Water is our most precious natural resource.
words.exampleTranslation: 물은 우리의 가장 소중한 천연 자원이에요.

words.meaning: not harmful to the environment
words.example: This product is eco-friendly and biodegradable.

words.meaning: variety of plant and animal life in an environment
words.example: The rainforest has incredible biodiversity.
words.exampleTranslation: 열대우림은 놀라운 생물 다양성을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: a place where waste is buried in the ground
words.example: Most of our garbage goes to landfills.

words.meaning: gas that traps heat in the atmosphere
words.example: Carbon dioxide is a major greenhouse gas.

words.meaning: fuel formed from ancient plants and animals
words.example: Coal and oil are fossil fuels.

words.meaning: device that converts sunlight into electricity
words.example: We installed solar panels on our roof.

words.meaning: a machine that generates electricity from wind
words.example: Wind turbines are becoming more common.
words.exampleTranslation: 풍력 터빈이 점점 더 보편화되고 있어요.

words.meaning: decayed organic material used as fertilizer
words.example: I compost my food scraps in the garden.
words.exampleTranslation: 저는 정원에서 음식물 찌꺼기를 퇴비로 만들어요.

words.meaning: making something impure or harmful
words.example: Water contamination is a serious health risk.

words.meaning: a large mass of ice that moves slowly
words.example: Glaciers are melting due to climate change.

words.meaning: the average height of the ocean's surface
words.example: Rising sea levels threaten coastal cities.
words.exampleTranslation: 해수면 상승이 해안 도시를 위협하고 있어요.

words.meaning: the layer of gases surrounding Earth
words.example: Pollution is damaging our atmosphere.

words.meaning: layer of gas that protects Earth from harmful rays
words.example: The ozone layer protects us from UV radiation.

words.meaning: chemical used to kill pests on crops
words.example: Organic farms don't use pesticides.

words.meaning: substance added to soil to help plants grow
words.example: Too much fertilizer can pollute rivers.
words.exampleTranslation: 비료를 너무 많이 사용하면 강을 오염시킬 수 있어요.

words.meaning: gradual wearing away of soil or rock
words.example: Heavy rainfall causes soil erosion.

words.meaning: able to decompose naturally
words.example: These bags are biodegradable and eco-friendly.

words.meaning: poisonous and harmful
words.example: Many cleaning products contain toxic chemicals.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 청소 제품에는 유독한 화학물질이 들어 있어요.

words.meaning: land where wildlife is legally protected
words.example: National parks are protected areas.

words.meaning: area of land managed to protect wildlife
words.example: The nature reserve is home to rare birds.
words.exampleTranslation: 자연 보호 구역에는 희귀한 새들이 살고 있어요.

words.meaning: to plant trees or crops again
words.example: We need to replant the forest after the fire.
words.exampleTranslation: 화재 후 숲을 다시 심어야 해요.

words.meaning: planting trees in an area that was forested
words.example: Reforestation helps fight climate change.
words.exampleTranslation: 재조림은 기후 변화와 싸우는 데 도움이 돼요.

words.meaning: plants and animals living in the ocean
words.example: Plastic pollution threatens marine life.
words.exampleTranslation: 플라스틱 오염이 해양 생물을 위협하고 있어요.

words.meaning: underwater structure made of coral
words.example: Coral reefs are dying due to ocean warming.

words.meaning: changing from solid to liquid due to heat
words.example: The melting of ice caps is accelerating.

words.meaning: thick layer of ice covering polar regions
words.example: The polar ice caps are shrinking every year.

exercises.question: Solar and wind power are examples of _____ energy.
Air _____ is a major problem in big cities.
We should _____ paper and plastic instead of throwing them away.
Many animals are _____ because their habitats are being destroyed.
The Amazon rainforest is a complex _____.
Dinosaurs became _____ millions of years ago.

우리는 미래 세대를 위해 환경을 보호해야 해요.
exercises.answer: We need to protect the environment for future generations.
